languages.text: "Ты уже приговорен за сотворенное с Даргонусом и сам факт своего существования, ксенос. То, что ты жив, — лишь отсрочка, не более".

traits.locale_text: "Ты уже приговорен за сотворенное с Даргонусом и сам факт своего существования, ксенос. То, что ты жив, — лишь отсрочка, не более".

languages.text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
languages.original_text: "Ты уже приговорен за сотворенное с Даргонусом и сам факт своего существования, ксенос. То, что ты жив, — лишь отсрочка, не более".

traits.locale_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
"You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
"You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
"You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
"You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
"You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

languages.text: 「お前がダルゴナスで引き起こした所業、そしてお前という異種族の存在そのもの―そのすべてはすでに裁かれている。今こうして生きながらえているのは、ただの一時的な執行猶予にすぎない」
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がダルゴナスで引き起こした所業、そしてお前という異種族の存在そのもの―そのすべてはすでに裁かれている。今こうして生きながらえているのは、ただの一時的な執行猶予にすぎない」

languages.text: "Ihr wurdet bereits dafür verurteilt, was Ihr auf Dargonus getan habt, Xenos — und für Eure bloße Existenz. Dass Ihr noch immer lebt, ist nur eine vorübergehende Strafaussetzung."
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wurdet bereits dafür verurteilt, was Ihr auf Dargonus getan habt, Xenos — und für Eure bloße Existenz. Dass Ihr noch immer lebt, ist nur eine vorübergehende Strafaussetzung."

languages.text: « Vous avez déjà été jugé pour les crimes que vous avez commis sur Dargonus, xénos, et pour votre existence même. Profitez bien de votre sursis, il ne durera pas. »
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez déjà été jugé pour les crimes que vous avez commis sur Dargonus, xénos, et pour votre existence même. Profitez bien de votre sursis, il ne durera pas. »

languages.text: «Ya se te ha juzgado por tus actos en Dargonus, xenos; y por el hecho mismo de existir. Que sigas con vida es simplemente un aplazamiento provisional de tu sentencia».
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: «Ya se te ha juzgado por tus actos en Dargonus, xenos; y por el hecho mismo de existir. Que sigas con vida es simplemente un aplazamiento provisional de tu sentencia».

languages.text: “由于你在达戈努斯犯下的罪行，以及你的存在本身，异形，我已经下达了判决。尽管你还活着，但这也仅仅是暂缓处刑而已。”
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: “由于你在达戈努斯犯下的罪行，以及你的存在本身，异形，我已经下达了判决。尽管你还活着，但这也仅仅是暂缓处刑而已。”

languages.text: "Dargonus'a yaptıklarının ve hatta buradaki varlığının cezası çoktan kesildi zeno. Hâlâ hayattasın... Şimdilik."
languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'a yaptıklarının ve hatta buradaki varlığının cezası çoktan kesildi zeno. Hâlâ hayattasın... Şimdilik."

languages.original_text: "You have already been judged for what you wrought on Dargonus, xenos — and for the very fact of your existence. That you are still alive is merely a temporary suspension."
